provider.name: Posteo.de
provider.documentation: Please check if additional email account protection isn't enabled.

provider.name: free.fr
provider.documentation: SMTP est désactivé par défaut, veuillez voir ici pour un guide détaillé.

provider.name: Fastmail
provider.documentation: You might need an app password; You can\'t use third party email apps with the basic plan, please see here.

provider.name: gmx.com
provider.documentation: Is IMAP enabled? Two factor authentication requires an app password!

provider.documentation: Ist IMAP aktiviert? Die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung erfordert ein App-Passwort!

provider.name: Yandex
provider.documentation: Please check if IMAP is enabled

provider.name: web.de
provider.documentation: Ist IMAP aktiviert? Die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung erfordert ein Anwendungsspezifische Passwort!

provider.name: T-Online.de
provider.documentation: Für T-Online müssen Sie ein App-Passwort anstelle Ihres normalen Kontopassworts verwenden, siehe hier.

provider.name: Ionos (1und1)
provider.documentation: Für Ionos müssen Sie ein E-Mail-Passwort anstelle Ihres normalen Kontopassworts verwenden, siehe hier.

provider.name: Ionos.com
provider.documentation: For Ionos you need to use an email password instead of your normal account password, please see here.

provider.name: Ionos.co.uk
provider.documentation: For Ionos you need to use an email password instead of your normal account password, please see here.

provider.name: freenet.de
provider.documentation: Haben Sie SMTP über die Systemsteuerung des E-Mail-Anbieters aktiviert?

provider.name: Zoho
provider.documentation: You might need to enable IMAP and use an app password.

provider.documentation: You might need to enable IMAP and use an app password.

provider.name: Zoho AU
provider.documentation: You might need to enable IMAP and use an app password.

provider.name: Zoho pro
provider.documentation: You might need to enable IMAP and use an app password.

provider.name: Mailfence
provider.documentation: If you generated service-specific passwords, you may need to configure an account and and identity manually.

provider.name: AOL
provider.documentation: For AOL you need to use an app password instead of your normal account password, please see here.

provider.name: Laposte.net
provider.documentation: Vous devez utiliser votre adresse e-mail principale. Il n'est plus possible d'utiliser une adresse alias pour authentifier un compte!

provider.name: Interia
provider.documentation: Please check if IMAP is enabled on the website of the email provider. Sprawdź, czy protokół IMAP jest włączony na stronie internetowej dostawcy poczty e-mail.

provider.name: GoDaddy Workspace
provider.documentation: 'SmtpClientAuthentication is disabled': please see here

provider.name: Xfinity/Comcast
provider.documentation: Please check if third party email access is enabled

provider.name: Mail.com
provider.documentation: Using third-party email clients requires a premium mail.com subscription. This is not a limitation of FairEmail.

provider.name: AT&T
provider.documentation: Instead of a password you should use a secure mail key

provider.name: Countermail
provider.documentation: Instead of a password you should use an IMAP-key

provider.name: Braxmail
provider.documentation: The username of a Braxmail account is account-specific, and therefore an account/identity needs to be configured via 'Manual setup and account options' in the main settings screen. See the video you receive for the correct configuration data.

provider.name: OK.de
provider.documentation: Wichtig! Voraussetzung für den Zugriff mit externen E-Mail-Clients ist die Aktivierung von IMAP/POP-Zugriff.

provider.name: Forward Email
provider.documentation: Sending email requires a subscription.

provider.name: Namirial
provider.documentation: Potrebbe essere necessaria una password per l'applicazione, vedere qui.
